answers.answer: What's wrong? Why do you have to be induced?
because of preeclampsia Idk if that spelled out right
I'm sure the baby is perfectly fine and look at it this way, her coming into this world will give you a whole new reason to enjoy the holiday season

Oh yes that's right tomorrows Christmas eve! Oh I would love a Christmas or Christmas eve baby! I hope everything turns out okay for you and you baby! I'm sure it will. At least you made it to will term :)
Thank you! Yeah full term is a good thing. I will also POST on this tomorrow or when the baby comes for updates.

I'm in the same boat as you. I just got back from the doctor and my doctor is gonna induce me today at 5! I'm so scared. I'm 37 weeks and 3 days today! And he said cause my blood pressure is a little high that's why he is inducing me. Plus my baby is really really low already and I'm about 4 cm also.
They did not check that she said they will tomorrow.Ya she wanted me to go in tonight but I needed to find a person to take my son while I am in the hospital

question: Soo vent because I am stressing out.I went in to the doctors today and did some test found out I need to be induce tomorrow! I am freaking out and just wanna cry.I dont want any problems with my baby, I just dont know want to think.I was hoping it would not come to this and I would have her normal or at least close to her due date the 11th.Anything positive or just somthing that would help.
title: 37 week 19 more days as of today
